tasks.label: denopack watch
tasks.command: deno run --unstable --allow-all --import-map build_src/import_map.build.json https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jeiea/denopack/deno-1.20.3/cli.ts --config build_src/denopack_config.ts -o vim_comic_viewer.user.js --input ${workspaceFolder}/src/mod.tsx --watch src
